## 各隊最辛苦的球員

計算依據為出戰分鐘數最多的球員

```{r echo=T}
MaxPoint<-aggregate(TotalPoints~Team,NBA1415,max)
NBA1415MaxPoint<-merge(NBA1415,MaxPoint)
NBA1415MaxPoint[order(NBA1415MaxPoint$TotalPoints,decreasing = T),c("Team","Name","TotalPoints")]
```
